p.s: The given sequence has many purposes.
In my opinion there are three main purposes.
First is showing the Carter family in different kinds of situations.
The second is showinshowing King as an enemy.
Lastly the third is presenting the police not as an ally but as a foe yet again.
These three purposes make up most of the action in the sequence.
To create a happy Atmosphereatmosphere when the family was eating the director used many devices.
First off is the music.
The song that plays is a relaxing one.
Furthermore the noises of people chattering in the background, StarrsStarr's family eating and laughing creates a typical dining atmosphere.
They also prayed before eating which makes the viewer think that nothing bad can happen now.
The camera made close up shots from everyone in front of them in the family and everyone smiled which adds to the good atmosphere.
The good atmosphere ended when the camera zoomed in on King in focus standing outside the store in the dark with a few gang members.
One can say that they are well built and strong, which makes the entrance even more dangerous.
The music changed to an intimidating one and the facial expression of Starr and Maverick immedeatlyimmediately changed to a serious one when they saw King.
These devices create a scary and intimidating atmosphere.
The device which is the most important is that Maverick, who was cheerful seconds ago, said in a serious voice and face to stay in the store.
The police moved to Maverick quickly and didn't let him explain.
The camera also moved quick to Maverick to underline the action.
The police man who took action against Carter first was a black police man.
This shows the viewer that all of the police is corrupted in this movie.
Their facial expressions went into a shocked state when they knew Starr was the witness.
This shows the viewer that they are worry of Starr and Starr managed to overcome the situation where Khalil died without deaths this time.
The director shows the viewer that StarrsStarr's family has a strong bond.
They fight together and laugh together.
